concentrationSummary.concentrationSummary: Interactive media is the creation of front end development, such as graphic design, for websites. Creative talents are expressed through hands-on projects in and outside the classroom. From graphic design to user testing, interactive media gives you a full perspective of how the creative process works.

employmentOutlook.employmentOutlook: Employment of web developers is projected to grow 13% from 2018 to 2080,  faster than the average for all occupations.

jobOpportunities.jobOpportunities: Interactive media gives students the skills to create user experiences across all platforms.

medianSalary.medianSalary: The median salary of a web developer is $69,430. Web developers are ranked as the 3rd best technology job to have.

description.description: Involves understanding both graphic design and computer programming to help create the look, layout, and features of a website.
Multi-skilled designer who organizes web and mobile applications to simplify the user experience for potential consumers.
Involved with projects from the very start to overlook the activities based on customer requirements.
Develop usable and eye catching designs for mobile devices.

bio.bio: Jalen works for the Fairfield County School District. The Adobe Suite programs has helped him throughout his career.
Alexandra works for Uncommn in Greenville, SC. She has learned to gain the confidence to be proud of her work.

node.title: Bee Website
node.shortDescription: A website informing the public on bees and the need to protect them.

projectMedia.description: This was a website I designed and coded in VCOM 363. It was a website aiming to spread awareness of endangered bees and how to help stop it. There were two main goals for the website: inform users and get donations.

node.title: The Last Straw
node.shortDescription: A website warning of the harm plastic straws bring to our ecosystem.

projectMedia.description: This project is a website aiming to show the issue of single-use plastics polluting the ocean, specifically focusing on plastic straws. Simple illustrations and interesting ocean-themed colors were chosen to bring a bit of light to a dark subject. The objective of the site is to provide information on the topic and raise a call to action by showing people how to help.
